channel.title: How to make an npc NOT ATTACK BACK
channel.description: In delta base how do i make an npc not attack back? "Note i'm not making a noob server I just want a range training area where you can train range without being attacked."

item.title: How to make an npc NOT ATTACK BACK
item.dc:creator: @Dustin.mcguire Dustin.mcguire
item.description:
@Dustin.mcguire wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:12, topic:333416”]you know Npc’s can’t walk threw other Npc’s. Just find a null Npc, there are tons of them.

Just put the other npc’s on the other side of the gate. Make the null Npc’s on the gate. So they go nowhere.[/quote]
Thank you :)! Your answer was the best one yet.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an npc NOT ATTACK BACK

item.title: How to make an npc NOT ATTACK BACK
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

you know Npc’s can’t walk threw other Npc’s. Just find a null Npc, there are tons of them.

Just put the other npc’s on the other side of the gate. Make the null Npc’s on the gate. So they go nowhere.

item.title: How to make an npc NOT ATTACK BACK

item.description:
@Dustin.mcguire wrote:

The Chubby Bunny:

isn’t there a boolean for an npc being in combat (Something like isAttacking)?

I’m not quite sure I check, I just hope it won’t affect all npc’s otherwise i’m just goanna not do it lol.
